title: Irreversível
overview: A tormented psychologist, Júlia Mendes, and a determined inspector, Pedro Sousa, team up to solve a brutal murder of a young girl in a coastal town. As they solve the crime, they battle their own demons and try to keep their lives intact. In a city where everyone is hiding something and is willing to do anything to protect their loved ones, the search for the truth may cost more than Julia imagines, since from the moment the secrets of the past are revealed, everything becomes irreversible. Does love justify everything?
